text: Donald Beaton Verrilli Jr. (born June 29, 1957) is an American lawyer. He was the Solicitor General of the United States from 2011 until 2016 during the Barack Obama adminsitration.Nina Totenberg, Donald Verrilli, Who Argued Groundbreaking Cases For The Government, Stepping Down, NPR (June 2, 2016). ==References== ==Other websites== * Donald Verrilli nomination information , U.S. Senate * Don Verrilli at whorunsgov.com * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:United States Solicitors General Category:Lawyers from New Rochelle, New York Category:Politicians from New Rochelle, New York Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:People from Wilton, Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Connecticut
